Auditing

RecoveryAudit

Recover your cash and increase your working capital.
Book A Free Consultation

Home

Recovery audit in UAE

Recover excess payments with recovery audit in UAE! It’s a systematic approach to review transactions and attempting to recover any excess payments or any under deductions to the suppliers.

At A & A associates, we have a team of experienced accountants and auditors who collect all your business related data and identify any transactions that are over-paid. We ensure excellent recovery audit in UAE and get the complete returns of your investment. We identify any abnormalities and collect sufficient evidence to recover all the amount lost due to such errors.

We could see millions of entrepreneurs losing millions of dirhams due to financial errors, under-deductions, allowances, over-payments, and compliance issues. Our highly skilled team focus on achieving 100% recovery by reducing material anomalies that create a significant impact on the profit.

What is the process of recovery audit in UAE?

Enhance your business with the team of best auditors in Dubai! We ensure that our recovery audit services get the most value out of your investments.

This audit services will systematically review the information on your payments, including all the supporting data, they identify any over-payments or under-deductions that may have occurred in the past. After identifying these abnormalities, we conduct a recovery of all the lost resources from the disbursement errors.

With a proficient team of auditors, A & A associate ensure insightful recovery audit in UAE providing unparallel services to our clients.

Benefits of A & A associates recovery audit in UAE

Enhance your business with the team of best auditors in Dubai! We ensure that our recovery audit services get the most value out of your investments.

This audit services will systematically review the information on your payments, including all the supporting data, they identify any over-payments or under-deductions that may have occurred in the past. After identifying these abnormalities, we conduct a recovery of all the lost resources from the disbursement errors.

With a proficient team of auditors, A & A associate ensure insightful recovery audit in UAE providing unparallel services to our clients.

  • Certified professionals – We have a team of certified professionals to ensure seamless execution. Each client has a dedicated team in recovering their overpayments. Prevent future overpayments and enhance your control processes.
  • Statement audit – Statement audits identify the difference of accounting records from your organization’s ledger and partner’s record books. With proper anomaly analysis, identify and recover any overpayments, revenue leakage or other funds belonging to your organization.
  • Records review – Certain missed returns, unrecorded deposits, end of fiscal period payments and many other transactions occur without proper accounting. With our recovery audit in UAE, review your accounting records and come up with better results.
  • Professional approach, exceptional results – We work carefully to ensure the statements are obtained in a professional and coordinated manner. With experienced auditor, we ensure each claim is thoroughly examined and documented prior to recovery audit.

Whether free zone companies have any separate treatment on VAT laws?

With decades of experience, we are one of the most-trusted choices among auditing companies in the UAE.

Some of our services in recovery audit in UAE include,
  • Overpayments
  • Currency and pricing errors
  • Duplicate payments
  • Unclaimed cheques
  • Improper application of taxes
  • Detect hidden risks
  • Recover lost revenue

Why choose us?

Whether your business is a small venture, medium-sized or a successful organization, make sure that your resources are effectively used and aim at meeting the long-term goals.

We at A & A associates ensure cost-effective and systematic operations to allocate your resources properly with the most-reliable auditors in Dubai. With decades of accumulated gulf experience, be satisfied knowing that your financial health is in the right hands.

We ensure great flexibility in recovery audit in UAE; our aim is to achieve total client satisfaction in whatever we do. Identify and recapture lost profits! For more information, contact us now!
